title: PHPintdiv()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPintdiv()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example Perform some integer divisions: "; echo intdiv(5, 2) . "
"; echo intdiv(-5, -2); ?> Definition and Usage The intdiv() function is used for integer division. Syntax intdiv( dividend , divisor ); Parameter Values Parameter Description dividend Required. Specifies a number that will be divided divisor Required. Specifies the number to divide the dividend by Technical Details Return Value: The integer part of the division Return Type: Integer PHP Version: 7+ ★ +1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
"; echo intdiv(5, 2) . "
"; echo intdiv(-5, -2); ?>

summary: This tutorial covers PHPintdiv()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPintdiv()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPintdiv()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
